22namespace ProfilerAgentState {
23static const char samplingInterval[] = "samplingInterval";
24static const char userInitiatedProfiling[] = "userInitiatedProfiling";
25static const char profilerEnabled[] = "profilerEnabled";
26static const char preciseCoverageStarted[] = "preciseCoverageStarted";
27static const char preciseCoverageCallCount[] = "preciseCoverageCallCount";
28static const char preciseCoverageDetailed[] = "preciseCoverageDetailed";
29static const char preciseCoverageAllowTriggeredUpdates[] =
30 "preciseCoverageAllowTriggeredUpdates";
31} // namespace ProfilerAgentState

33namespace {
34
35String16 resourceNameToUrl(V8InspectorImpl* inspector,
36 v8::Local<v8::String> v8Name) {
37 String16 name = toProtocolString(inspector->isolate(), v8Name);
38 if (!inspector) return name;
39 std::unique_ptr<StringBuffer> url =
40 inspector->client()->resourceNameToUrl(toStringView(name));
41 return url ? toString16(url->string()) : name;
42}
43
44std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::PositionTickInfo>>
45buildInspectorObjectForPositionTicks(const v8::CpuProfileNode* node) {
46 unsigned lineCount = node->GetHitLineCount();
47 if (!lineCount) return nullptr;
48 auto array =
49 std::make_unique<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::PositionTickInfo>>();
50 std::vector<v8::CpuProfileNode::LineTick> entries(lineCount);
51 if (node->GetLineTicks(&entries[0], lineCount)) {
52 for (unsigned i = 0; i < lineCount; i++) {
53 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::PositionTickInfo> line =
54 protocol::Profiler::PositionTickInfo::create()
55 .setLine(entries[i].line)
56 .setTicks(entries[i].hit_count)
57 .build();
58 array->emplace_back(std::move(line));
59 }
60 }
61 return array;
62}
63
64std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::ProfileNode> buildInspectorObjectFor(
65 V8InspectorImpl* inspector, const v8::CpuProfileNode* node) {
66 v8::Isolate* isolate = inspector->isolate();
67 v8::HandleScope handleScope(isolate);
68 auto callFrame =
69 protocol::Runtime::CallFrame::create()
70 .setFunctionName(toProtocolString(isolate, node->GetFunctionName()))
71 .setScriptId(String16::fromInteger(node->GetScriptId()))
72 .setUrl(resourceNameToUrl(inspector, node->GetScriptResourceName()))
73 .setLineNumber(node->GetLineNumber() - 1)
74 .setColumnNumber(node->GetColumnNumber() - 1)
75 .build();
76 auto result = protocol::Profiler::ProfileNode::create()
77 .setCallFrame(std::move(callFrame))
78 .setHitCount(node->GetHitCount())
79 .setId(node->GetNodeId())
80 .build();
81
82 const int childrenCount = node->GetChildrenCount();
83 if (childrenCount) {
84 auto children = std::make_unique<protocol::Array<int>>();
85 for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)
86 children->emplace_back(node->GetChild(i)->GetNodeId());
87 result->setChildren(std::move(children));
88 }
89
90 const char* deoptReason = node->GetBailoutReason();
91 if (deoptReason && deoptReason[0] && strcmp(deoptReason, "no reason"))
92 result->setDeoptReason(deoptReason);
93
94 auto positionTicks = buildInspectorObjectForPositionTicks(node);
95 if (positionTicks) result->setPositionTicks(std::move(positionTicks));
96
97 return result;
98}
99
100std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<int>> buildInspectorObjectForSamples(
101 v8::CpuProfile* v8profile) {
102 auto array = std::make_unique<protocol::Array<int>>();
103 int count = v8profile->GetSamplesCount();
104 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
105 array->emplace_back(v8profile->GetSample(i)->GetNodeId());
106 return array;
107}
108
109std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<int>> buildInspectorObjectForTimestamps(
110 v8::CpuProfile* v8profile) {
111 auto array = std::make_unique<protocol::Array<int>>();
112 int count = v8profile->GetSamplesCount();
113 uint64_t lastTime = v8profile->GetStartTime();
114 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
115 uint64_t ts = v8profile->GetSampleTimestamp(i);
116 array->emplace_back(static_cast<int>(ts - lastTime));
117 lastTime = ts;
118 }
119 return array;
120}
121
122void flattenNodesTree(V8InspectorImpl* inspector,
123 const v8::CpuProfileNode* node,
124 protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ProfileNode>* list) {
125 list->emplace_back(buildInspectorObjectFor(inspector, node));
126 const int childrenCount = node->GetChildrenCount();
127 for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)
128 flattenNodesTree(inspector, node->GetChild(i), list);
129}
130
131std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::Profile> createCPUProfile(
132 V8InspectorImpl* inspector, v8::CpuProfile* v8profile) {
133 auto nodes =
134 std::make_unique<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ProfileNode>>();
135 flattenNodesTree(inspector, v8profile->GetTopDownRoot(), nodes.get());
136 return protocol::Profiler::Profile::create()
137 .setNodes(std::move(nodes))
138 .setStartTime(static_cast<double>(v8profile->GetStartTime()))
139 .setEndTime(static_cast<double>(v8profile->GetEndTime()))
140 .setSamples(buildInspectorObjectForSamples(v8profile))
141 .setTimeDeltas(buildInspectorObjectForTimestamps(v8profile))
142 .build();
143}
144
145std::unique_ptr<protocol::Debugger::Location> currentDebugLocation(
146 V8InspectorImpl* inspector) {
147 auto stackTrace = V8StackTraceImpl::capture(inspector->debugger(), 1);
148 CHECK(stackTrace);
149 CHECK(!stackTrace->isEmpty());
150 return protocol::Debugger::Location::create()
151 .setScriptId(String16::fromInteger(stackTrace->topScriptId()))
152 .setLineNumber(stackTrace->topLineNumber())
153 .setColumnNumber(stackTrace->topColumnNumber())
154 .build();
155}
156
157volatile int s_lastProfileId = 0;

159} // namespace

161class V8ProfilerAgentImpl::ProfileDescriptor {
162 public:
163 ProfileDescriptor(const String16& id, const String16& title)
164 : m_id(id), m_title(title) {}
165 String16 m_id;
166 String16 m_title;
167};
168
169V8ProfilerAgentImpl::V8ProfilerAgentImpl(
170 V8InspectorSessionImpl* session, protocol::FrontendChannel* frontendChannel,
171 protocol::DictionaryValue* state)
172 : m_session(session),
173 m_isolate(m_session->inspector()->isolate()),
174 m_state(state),
175 m_frontend(frontendChannel) {}
176
177V8ProfilerAgentImpl::~V8ProfilerAgentImpl() {
178 if (m_profiler) m_profiler->Dispose();
179}
180
181void V8ProfilerAgentImpl::consoleProfile(const String16& title) {
182 if (!m_enabled) return;
183 String16 id = nextProfileId();
184 m_startedProfiles.push_back(ProfileDescriptor(id, title));
185 startProfiling(id);
186 m_frontend.consoleProfileStarted(
187 id, currentDebugLocation(m_session->inspector()), title);
188}
189
190void V8ProfilerAgentImpl::consoleProfileEnd(const String16& title) {
191 if (!m_enabled) return;
192 String16 id;
193 String16 resolvedTitle;
194 // Take last started profile if no title was passed.
195 if (title.isEmpty()) {
196 if (m_startedProfiles.empty()) return;
197 id = m_startedProfiles.back().m_id;
198 resolvedTitle = m_startedProfiles.back().m_title;
199 m_startedProfiles.pop_back();
200 } else {
201 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_startedProfiles.size(); i++) {
202 if (m_startedProfiles[i].m_title == title) {
203 resolvedTitle = title;
204 id = m_startedProfiles[i].m_id;
205 m_startedProfiles.erase(m_startedProfiles.begin() + i);
206 break;
207 }
208 }
209 if (id.isEmpty()) return;
210 }
211 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::Profile> profile =
212 stopProfiling(id, true);
213 if (!profile) return;
214 m_frontend.consoleProfileFinished(
215 id, currentDebugLocation(m_session->inspector()), std::move(profile),
216 resolvedTitle);
217}
218
219Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::enable() {
220 if (!m_enabled) {
221 m_enabled = true;
222 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::profilerEnabled, true);
223 }
224
225 return Response::Success();
226}
227
228Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::disable() {
229 if (m_enabled) {
230 for (size_t i = m_startedProfiles.size(); i > 0; --i)
231 stopProfiling(m_startedProfiles[i - 1].m_id, false);
232 m_startedProfiles.clear();
233 stop(nullptr);
234 stopPreciseCoverage();
235 DCHECK(!m_profiler);
236 m_enabled = false;
237 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::profilerEnabled, false);
238 }
239
240 return Response::Success();
241}
242
243Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::setSamplingInterval(int interval) {
244 if (m_profiler) {
245 return Response::ServerError(
246 "Cannot change sampling interval when profiling.");
247 }
248 m_state->setInteger(ProfilerAgentState::samplingInterval, interval);
249 return Response::Success();
250}
251
252void V8ProfilerAgentImpl::restore() {
253 DCHECK(!m_enabled);
254 if (m_state->booleanProperty(ProfilerAgentState::profilerEnabled, false)) {
255 m_enabled = true;
256 DCHECK(!m_profiler);
257 if (m_state->booleanProperty(ProfilerAgentState::userInitiatedProfiling,
258 false)) {
259 start();
260 }
261 if (m_state->booleanProperty(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageStarted,
262 false)) {
263 bool callCount = m_state->booleanProperty(
264 ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageCallCount, false);
265 bool detailed = m_state->booleanProperty(
266 ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageDetailed, false);
267 bool updatesAllowed = m_state->booleanProperty(
268 ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageAllowTriggeredUpdates, false);
269 double timestamp;
270 startPreciseCoverage(Maybe<bool>(callCount), Maybe<bool>(detailed),
271 Maybe<bool>(updatesAllowed), &timestamp);
272 }
273 }
274}
275
276Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::start() {
277 if (m_recordingCPUProfile) return Response::Success();
278 if (!m_enabled) return Response::ServerError("Profiler is not enabled");
279 m_recordingCPUProfile = true;
280 m_frontendInitiatedProfileId = nextProfileId();
281 startProfiling(m_frontendInitiatedProfileId);
282 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::userInitiatedProfiling, true);
283 return Response::Success();
284}
285
286Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::stop(
287 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::Profile>* profile) {
288 if (!m_recordingCPUProfile) {
289 return Response::ServerError("No recording profiles found");
290 }
291 m_recordingCPUProfile = false;
292 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::Profile> cpuProfile =
293 stopProfiling(m_frontendInitiatedProfileId, !!profile);
294 if (profile) {
295 *profile = std::move(cpuProfile);
296 if (!*profile) return Response::ServerError("Profile is not found");
297 }
298 m_frontendInitiatedProfileId = String16();
299 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::userInitiatedProfiling, false);
300 return Response::Success();
301}
302
303Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::startPreciseCoverage(
304 Maybe<bool> callCount, Maybe<bool> detailed,
305 Maybe<bool> allowTriggeredUpdates, double* out_timestamp) {
306 if (!m_enabled) return Response::ServerError("Profiler is not enabled");
307 *out_timestamp = v8::base::TimeTicks::Now().since_origin().InSecondsF();
308 bool callCountValue = callCount.value_or(false);
309 bool detailedValue = detailed.value_or(false);
310 bool allowTriggeredUpdatesValue = allowTriggeredUpdates.value_or(false);
311 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageStarted, true);
312 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageCallCount,
313 callCountValue);
314 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageDetailed,
315 detailedValue);
316 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageAllowTriggeredUpdates,
317 allowTriggeredUpdatesValue);
318 // BlockCount is a superset of PreciseCount. It includes block-granularity
319 // coverage data if it exists (at the time of writing, that's the case for
320 // each function recompiled after the BlockCount mode has been set); and
321 // function-granularity coverage data otherwise.
322 using C = v8::debug::Coverage;
323 using Mode = v8::debug::CoverageMode;
324 Mode mode = callCountValue
325 ? (detailedValue ? Mode::kBlockCount : Mode::kPreciseCount)
326 : (detailedValue ? Mode::kBlockBinary : Mode::kPreciseBinary);
327 C::SelectMode(m_isolate, mode);
328 return Response::Success();
329}
330
331Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::stopPreciseCoverage() {
332 if (!m_enabled) return Response::ServerError("Profiler is not enabled");
333 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageStarted, false);
334 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageCallCount, false);
335 m_state->setBoolean(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageDetailed, false);
336 v8::debug::Coverage::SelectMode(m_isolate,
337 v8::debug::CoverageMode::kBestEffort);
338 return Response::Success();
339}
340
341namespace {
342std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::CoverageRange> createCoverageRange(
343 int start, int end, int count) {
344 return protocol::Profiler::CoverageRange::create()
345 .setStartOffset(start)
346 .setEndOffset(end)
347 .setCount(count)
348 .build();
349}
350
351Response coverageToProtocol(
352 V8InspectorImpl* inspector, const v8::debug::Coverage& coverage,
353 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ScriptCoverage>>*
354 out_result) {
355 auto result =
356 std::make_unique<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ScriptCoverage>>();
357 v8::Isolate* isolate = inspector->isolate();
358 for (size_t i = 0; i < coverage.ScriptCount(); i++) {
359 v8::debug::Coverage::ScriptData script_data = coverage.GetScriptData(i);
360 v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script = script_data.GetScript();
361 auto functions = std::make_unique<
362 protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::FunctionCoverage>>();
363 for (size_t j = 0; j < script_data.FunctionCount(); j++) {
364 v8::debug::Coverage::FunctionData function_data =
365 script_data.GetFunctionData(j);
366 auto ranges = std::make_unique<
367 protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::CoverageRange>>();
368
369 // Add function range.
370 ranges->emplace_back(createCoverageRange(function_data.StartOffset(),
371 function_data.EndOffset(),
372 function_data.Count()));
373
374 // Process inner blocks.
375 for (size_t k = 0; k < function_data.BlockCount(); k++) {
376 v8::debug::Coverage::BlockData block_data =
377 function_data.GetBlockData(k);
378 ranges->emplace_back(createCoverageRange(block_data.StartOffset(),
379 block_data.EndOffset(),
380 block_data.Count()));
381 }
382
383 functions->emplace_back(
384 protocol::Profiler::FunctionCoverage::create()
385 .setFunctionName(toProtocolString(
386 isolate,
387 function_data.Name().FromMaybe(v8::Local<v8::String>())))
388 .setRanges(std::move(ranges))
389 .setIsBlockCoverage(function_data.HasBlockCoverage())
390 .build());
391 }
392 String16 url;
393 v8::Local<v8::String> name;
394 if (script->SourceURL().ToLocal(&name) && name->Length()) {
395 url = toProtocolString(isolate, name);
396 } else if (script->Name().ToLocal(&name) && name->Length()) {
397 url = resourceNameToUrl(inspector, name);
398 }
399 result->emplace_back(protocol::Profiler::ScriptCoverage::create()
400 .setScriptId(String16::fromInteger(script->Id()))
401 .setUrl(url)
402 .setFunctions(std::move(functions))
403 .build());
404 }
405 *out_result = std::move(result);
406 return Response::Success();
407}
408} // anonymous namespace
409
410Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::takePreciseCoverage(
411 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ScriptCoverage>>*
412 out_result,
413 double* out_timestamp) {
414 if (!m_state->booleanProperty(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageStarted,
415 false)) {
416 return Response::ServerError("Precise coverage has not been started.");
417 }
418 v8::HandleScope handle_scope(m_isolate);
419 v8::debug::Coverage coverage = v8::debug::Coverage::CollectPrecise(m_isolate);
420 *out_timestamp = v8::base::TimeTicks::Now().since_origin().InSecondsF();
421 return coverageToProtocol(m_session->inspector(), coverage, out_result);
422}
423
424void V8ProfilerAgentImpl::triggerPreciseCoverageDeltaUpdate(
425 const String16& occasion) {
426 if (!m_state->booleanProperty(ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageStarted,
427 false)) {
428 return;
429 }
430 if (!m_state->booleanProperty(
431 ProfilerAgentState::preciseCoverageAllowTriggeredUpdates, false)) {
432 return;
433 }
434 v8::HandleScope handle_scope(m_isolate);
435 v8::debug::Coverage coverage = v8::debug::Coverage::CollectPrecise(m_isolate);
436 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ScriptCoverage>>
437 out_result;
438 coverageToProtocol(m_session->inspector(), coverage, &out_result);
439 double now = v8::base::TimeTicks::Now().since_origin().InSecondsF();
440 m_frontend.preciseCoverageDeltaUpdate(now, occasion, std::move(out_result));
441}
442
443Response V8ProfilerAgentImpl::getBestEffortCoverage(
444 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Array<protocol::Profiler::ScriptCoverage>>*
445 out_result) {
446 v8::HandleScope handle_scope(m_isolate);
447 v8::debug::Coverage coverage =
448 v8::debug::Coverage::CollectBestEffort(m_isolate);
449 return coverageToProtocol(m_session->inspector(), coverage, out_result);
450}
451
452String16 V8ProfilerAgentImpl::nextProfileId() {
453 return String16::fromInteger(
454 v8::base::Relaxed_AtomicIncrement(&s_lastProfileId, 1));
455}
456
457void V8ProfilerAgentImpl::startProfiling(const String16& title) {
458 v8::HandleScope handleScope(m_isolate);
459 if (!m_startedProfilesCount) {
460 DCHECK(!m_profiler);
461 m_profiler = v8::CpuProfiler::New(m_isolate);
462 int interval =
463 m_state->integerProperty(ProfilerAgentState::samplingInterval, 0);
464 if (interval) m_profiler->SetSamplingInterval(interval);
465 }
466 ++m_startedProfilesCount;
467 m_profiler->StartProfiling(toV8String(m_isolate, title), true);
468}
469
470std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::Profile> V8ProfilerAgentImpl::stopProfiling(
471 const String16& title, bool serialize) {
472 v8::HandleScope handleScope(m_isolate);
473 v8::CpuProfile* profile =
474 m_profiler->StopProfiling(toV8String(m_isolate, title));
475 std::unique_ptr<protocol::Profiler::Profile> result;
476 if (profile) {
477 if (serialize) result = createCPUProfile(m_session->inspector(), profile);
478 profile->Delete();
479 }
480 --m_startedProfilesCount;
481 if (!m_startedProfilesCount) {
482 m_profiler->Dispose();
483 m_profiler = nullptr;
484 }
485 return result;
486}
